attributes.action: ensure that leader of Essex County Council, Lord Hanningfield, should be forced to resign now that he faces criminal charges over his expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, believe that Lord Hanningfield should be forced by the government to resign from his post as leader of Essex County Council now that he faces criminal charges over his expense claims.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the council. Please contact them directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
